about_the_game:
Welcome to Keyboard Crush, a 2D action game where every click determines your survival! Enemy shapes - squares, circles and triangles - drop down from above and it's your job to destroy them before they overwhelm you. Each enemy has its own specific characteristics that force you to be ever vigilant and quick.

Some shapes move slowly but are durable, while others fly quickly across the screen and surprise you with their unpredictability. You'll need to recognize each shape carefully and react immediately by pressing the right key. As the speed of enemies increases, you'll have to rely not only on your reflexes, but also on the strategic use of power-ups!

Power-ups can temporarily help you turn the tide, slow down enemies, destroy any shapes on the screen or boost your firepower. Each power-up has its own use, so combining them correctly can be the key to your success.

Key Features:

  • Varied enemies with unique characteristics - each shape presents a different type of challenge

  • Fast and addictive gameplay that will test your reflexes

  • Strategic power-ups to help you at critical moments

  • Escalating difficulty - faster enemy attacks and unpredictable behaviour

  • Clean and minimalistic 2D graphics for clear navigation of the action

Are you ready to face an increasingly difficult challenge and use all available options to survive? Destroying shapes and gaining dominance has never been so intense!

name: Keyboard Crush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
